I know one of the organisers works with some bookmaker trading desks and I’m hoping to get him or his customers to leak some alpha in a nearby bar afterwards. <https://awsdeepdivesdays.splashthat.com|https://awsdeepdivesdays.splashthat.com>

attachments.text: Get ready to dive deep into the world of AI and ML at the AWS Deep Dive Days (D3) in London on 18-19th April! Join AWS ML specialists as they share their insights and expertise on the latest developments in these cutting-edge technologies.Across two packed days, learn how AI and ML can solve common business problems and dive deep into the technology with hands-on training and presentations. Thanks to the rapid adoption of cloud computing, the rise of compute power and data volumes, and the emergence of easy-to-use solutions, these technologies are now more accessible than <http://ever.AI|ever.AI> and ML are no longer just nice-to-have tools for organizations - they've become core components of driving innovation, growth and achieving business goals. Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a leader in this technology, providing the broadest and most complete set of AI and ML services for businesses of any size.With over one hundred thousand AWS customers using AI and ML in finance; healthcare and life sciences; manufacturing; media and entertainment; public services; retail; technology; and many other industries, D3 is the perfect way to learn how these technologies can benefit your business. Don't miss out on this exciting opportunity to learn, network, and grow your skills at the AWS Deep Dive Days in London!
attachments.title: AWS Deep Dive Days
